description.lang: The photoelectric Smoke Detector is a Z-Wave enabled device which is fully compatible with any Z-Wave enabled network.Z-Wave enabled devices displaying the Z-Wave logo can also be used with it regardless of the manufacturer, and ours can also be used in other manufacturers Z-Wave enabled networks.Inclusion of this detector on other manufacturers Wireless Controller menu allows remote operation of connected modules when the detector is triggered.Z-Wave node in the system also acts as a repeater, so as to re-transmit the RF signal to ensure that the signal is received by its intended destination by routing the signal around obstacles and radio dead spots.
